asap! XD i know where u got that from
asdf i mean o.o

noone is wondering, they choose the skin earlier into the season to work on it, he was a monster of the top s5 and spring split, he was the last true tank to see top play before the false tanks and fighters arose to the meta, he fits in with simplicity and acceptability as every other victorious skin, and many other reasons.
poppy.  pick or ban 100% for the first half of the season.  Much more of an impact than Maokoi.
Maokai was the preferred choice at least around spring playoffs. poppy and ekko were the runner ups for best top lane at that time, but maokai was banned out a lot too.
And also screw Tank Ekko.

The only problem is that Poppy already has Battle Regalia skin, which features golden armor with a blue diamond shaped gem on the crown, which is the defining set of characteristics for Victorious skins. Because of that skin, they couldn't do a Victorious Poppy since it would just look like a copy of that skin.
Could've been because they just splashed every skin she had and thought to themselves, eh that's enough poppy for this season.

because there is a theory that last year they started to make a bunch of Victorious skins but they took sivir since it was the best one and since she was played and all, but in that same year Maokai was also played alot so they probably just thought : well instead of creating a new one why not take the Maokai skin and it'le make Maokai more popular and all, so idk but i think that theory is prolly right
Sivir was horrible. You have to go all the way back to Season 2 to find a vic skin that dull, but at least Janna had badass splash art.
actually the sivir skin is very nice. and its a free skin for doing well in the game. they could just give you nothing at all. no point in complaining about something you get for free
If I'm unranked right now, can I get to gold?
Not with that username
if u try hard enough

cool the champion i haven't seen in 3 months, the skin everyone wanted.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
ikr thumbs down to riot

Can we get a remake on victorious Maokai? Like really. I know you guys are using him because he was made already last year in a debate between him, sivir, and some other champ, but he's such an unpopular and boring champ for the majority; only used this season to hold back Ekko from becoming big in spring. Ekko, GP, Gnar, or even Shen would've been a way better choice. Shen would've been nice to go with cs Zed but I digress. There are just better options even if I don't play top. Thanks for the free skin, but it'll just be there, probably never used or used once just to see it in game.
for those wondering, hes currently sitting at the lowest playrate (pickrate) of all top laners and 8th lowest from all champions. This is a joke. the worst is that it's my first season gold...
I feel exactly the same

>gets a free skin

>wants a different free skin

k

"Gets a snickers for free instead of hersey's"

"Is allergic to peanuts"

k

and you're allergic to a free maokai skin?

k

Yep, looking at it makes my eyes itch.
when you make an amazing comeback and they try to beat it but can't
Yes ranked should return sooner! Im all for it. The game is in a pretty good state so please don't make too many changes. Focus the work on your new client.

Yea honestly I agree with this. I know you doing that assassin rework which really has me worried.... Feel assassins are going to be even stronger and its really going to change the meta. I know this happens every 6 months but.... really not looking forward to a super assassin meta.
I sure am, there hasn't been an assassin meta for almost 3 years now.
same love my assassins
As an adc main not looking forward to 24/7 assassin's. Going to be worse than tank meta with maybe some out play potential.
NEVER.EVER.EVER ALLOW AN ASSASSIN META. Those champs are so freaking cancer its insane. I hate the playstyle and gameplay with a PASSION!!!!!!!

You can't be serious... look on gameplay right now and you will see a ton of "delete yasuo posts". Champions will be considered cancer in every meta, there doesn't seem to be an escape from that. Feral flare abusers, the super tanks with on release cinderhaulk, tank fizz, tank ekko, tank yasuo (honestly building champions tanky seems to be far more of a prevailing issue as perpetrators of cancerous gameplay than assassins ever were), basically there will always be the annoying champions of the patch. However at the very least the assassin meta brought activity. Games would accelerate to the pace of an assassin snowballing out of control instead of the metas since then mostly favoring tanks in a 'scale to late game teamfighting' play style. The fights are more fun to play, and far less boring. Also, while being able to get instantly deleted can cause a lot of frustration if you are a carry, it is by far better than  the tank meta. Nowadays when top gets super fed and starts split pushing (much like assassins did) you can't stop them because their stats are just too far ahead, they can stick to you and split without a great deal of danger. At least when an assassin got super fed they were still squishy and killable, now they just replaced that with tanks and super high base damage.
So tell me, why is it you prefer a zac at 4k hp being able to 100-0 you as a carry, than an assassin doing it who has to actually outplay your team.
better than cass vik every game
I hope they dont make them too weak as well cuz I usually play assassins.

It's a tree{{champion:57}}  that's painted blue and gold that we get. For all the grinding I did to gold, it makes me wish I stayed in bronze 5.
